timeoutCollection.doc: Newman timeout - Specify the time (in milliseconds) to wait for the entire collection run to complete execution.

timeoutRequest.doc: Newman timeoutRequest - Specify the time (in milliseconds) to wait for requests to return a response.

timeoutScript.doc: Newman timeoutScript - Specify the time (in milliseconds) to wait for scripts to complete execution.

generateJUnitResults.doc: Generate JUnit results reporter (provided by Postman's Newman).

autoOpenTestResultHtml.doc: Auto open test result in web browser after a run.

testResultsBasePath.doc: If not specified, the default is the same path to your local settings.json.

uploadTestResultsToWebserver.doc: Upload html test results to web server (for CI).

numberOfDaysToKeepTestResultsOnWebserver.doc: Upload html test results to web server (for CI).

sendSummaryResultsToSlack.doc: Send summary test results to slack (for CI).

slackIconTestsPass.doc: Slack icon to use when all tests pass.

slackIconTestsFail.doc: Slack icon to use when one or more tests fail.

slackHardAlertOnSuccess.doc: Send a hard alert to slack channel (to get notified) on success.

slackHardAlertOnFailure.doc: Send a hard alert to slack channel (to get notified) on failure.

slackToken.doc: Slack bot token (begins with 'xoxb'). See here for more info on how to create: https://api.slack.com/authentication/basics

limitConcurrency.doc: The maximum number of test cases you want to allow running concurrently/parallel.

projectName.doc: The name of the project you are running tests against (used in reports, slack, etc.).

environmentType.doc: The environment you want to run your tests against. (e.g. specifies which <xRunProjectPath>/xrun/<environmentType>.bulk file to use.)

xRunProjectPath.doc: The local xRun project path. (i.e. the local absolute path location of Postman tests in xRun project format.)

xRunProjectDirectoryName.doc: The name of the directory within xRunProjectPath used to store files used by xrun (e.g. <environmentType>.bulk, exclude-tests.json, etc.)
